title: Healthcare Practical Competency Strengthening: Display Technology Optimization Education Based on Reinforcement Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational optics theory, overview of display technology, and basic programming (Python)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain how the layered structure of display modules (diffusion layer, LED array, etc.) affects optical performance.
Learners can perform simulations to optimize display design parameters using reinforcement learning (DDQN) algorithms.
Learners can measure and analyze key quality metrics such as illumination uniformity.
In resource-constrained environments, learners can visualize and evaluate optimization results using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
